11.content: You Name is__________. You were just just a normal citizen with a normal life and a normal job. One day, you started to feel dizzy, you thought it was just a migraine until you fell on the floor and you passed out. When you woke up, everything was different. It felt like the universe decided to expand 10 fold and forgot you. You are shrunken at 1 inch and were in someone's room. The question is, who's?
11.title: It's You!

113.content: You gaze around you to see massive furniture jammed into a small room. It's dark, so you can't make out much. All you can make out is a bed with a teenage-looking girl snoring away. You then realise it's Momo Yaoyorozu from U.A high. You must be in the dorms! "What am I gonna do?" You ponder
113.title: Momo Yaoyorozu

1131.content: You decide to climb up the student's massive bed. You reach the top only to sink into extremely plushy sheets. Hobbling your way up to Momo, you now realize how curvy she really was. I little exploring Wouldn't hurt, right? You crawl towards the nearest feature; her massive partially exposed breasts. You snuggle in deep in her cleavage before her heartbeat lulls you to sleep. You're shook awake by the giantess getting out of bed. You stay there, watching as she is unbeknownst to your presence. You jump (or at least try) out of her breasts, only to call down her U. A uniform down to her panties. What do you do next?
1131.title: Climb onto bed

11313.content: You try to escape from her panties without her knowing. You counter against you as the waistband of Momo's PJ's stretches out. A massive hand at least 10 times your size grabs and pinches you. "Well what do we have here?" A voice booms in front of you. You then tell her that you suddenly woke up there and had no idea what happened. The understanding girl then sets you on her city-block sized dresser and changes, while you look away. You don't want to have a massive girl with the full capability to kill you in half a second flat angry at you. She then tells you you should probably come to school with her because of the daily dorm inspections that occured. You noticed she had a slight blush as she said these things, so you almost immediately knew what was gonna happen. Without objection, you slide into her awaiting mounds. You dig deep down so you won't be seen by any other people. Momo gave you a mini oxygen tank so you didn't suffocate. It almost felt like Momo had completely forgotten about you as the muffled chatter of class 1-a could be heard. Over the next 7 hours, you were thrown around, drenched in sweat, and even jabbed with Momo's smartphone. You were exhausted and hungry, but Momo sounded like she was headed back for the dorms. She plops on her bed, as you can tell by violently being thrown to the side. Almost enough, however, that you fly out of her boobs. You slide out and lay poking out from Momo's cleavage. She picks you up and sets you on her nightstand, and explains to you that they will have Mina, Uraraka, and Hagakure over for a movie, so you need to keep a low profile as not to be noticed by the others. The time comes, and the pink girl, the girl with brown bobb-cut hair, and the seemingly floating clothes enter the room. All of the sudden, you fall off the nightstand and slide next to Hagakure. What happens next?
11313.title: Try to escape

113131.content: "Hey Yaomomo, what is this?" The invisible girl explains. She picks you up as you now appear to be floating in the air. The other girls notice and Momo gives off a blush and snatches you from Hagakure and shoves you in her cleavage. "I-It was nothing! Nothing at all hehe~" Mina and Uraraka (and possibly Hagakure) tackle Momo and Uraraka snabs you from Momo's breasts. In the tussle that insued, you are flown into the air and land somewhere, knocking you unconcious. You wake up to panicked screams coming from somwhere, it's dark, where are you? The burning acids answer your question. You're in someone's stomach? But who?
113131.title: Hagakure sees you

choices: You decide to go to Mind's dorm room
1131311.content:
This stung more than Momo's stomach acid, so it had to be Mina! You pound against her stomach walls as you keep onto the intercom. You hear Mina panic and help "I ate the whatever it was Momo! We where playing and I felt something hit my throat but I thought nothing of it- wait, is it hitting my stomach wall? Omg the thing is alive! " Momo than quickly explained and told me she made another capsule, and Mina would send it down. You wait a little while as you then see the capsule pop down from her esophagus. You climb in, report ready, and feel the craft drift through her small intestine.


7 hours later

Mina picks you up and sets you down on the sink, studying you closely. She then whispers that they could have fun if you walked into the third room from the hall and sat on the green square she had set up. You agree, but on one condition. If you missed Mina's room, you could head back to Momo's because you felt safer with the gentle giant.
1131311.title: Mina Ashido

11313111.content:
You crawl through the dorms' shaggy carpeting, to get to Mina's room. You sneak under the doorway.and onto the green square she was talking about in Momo's bathroom. You crawl into the space and a day or looking mechanism closes around you and seals you inside.

30 minutes later

The door (a different one from before) opened to reveal the pink alien-looking girl in...
11313111.title: You decide to go to Mina's dorm room

choices: Have her put you in her panties
113131111.content: ...her underwear! You blush at the sight, which is reasonable. Her figure isn't as bendy as Momo's, but still impressive for 15. She snabs you in her left hand and begins to smile evilly. Slightly rubbing you, you feel a sharp pain all over your 2 inch body. Mina notices your facial features and immediately apologizes for activating her quirk. From where you where, you got an amazing view of her cleavage, which way like a massive curved V in your vision. You gaze at her knockers which are easily 4 times your height, strapped down by her white-with-green-polka-dots bra. It didn't bother you a bit that she was bright faded pink all over. She said she would could give you some choices. She's narrowed it down to 2 ideas, neither of which you disagreed with. You decide to...
113131111.title: A bra and panties

131.title: List

1311.content:
Izuku awoke in a dark room, “Huh, what’s going on?” Izuku couldn’t remember what happened last night and his head was hurting somewhat. The greenette couldn’t see anything but something felt off.

“Oh glad you’re awake, now the fun can begin” a familiar female voice said, the lights turned off and Izuku was surprised to see....
1311.title: Midoriya/Deku

13111.content:
"Mt.Lady! Where am I? And why are you using your quirk? Is there a villain nearby?" Said Izuku very nervous.

Mt.Lady giggled "I'm not using my quirk silly, I've actually shrunk you with a special I asked to build just for you. And please call me by my name: Yu Takeyama. After all it's normal that you call your new wife and owner by her name, although you can also call me 'dear', 'honey' or better yet: 'mistress'~" said Yu with a lustful look in her eyes.

"W-Wife!? O-Owner!? W-What are you talking about!?" stammered Izuku with a really strong blush and a bit of fear on his face.

"Do you remember the sludge villain accident from some weeks ago?(A/N: this happens when Izuku was training for One For All, so he doesn't have a quirk) I definelly do. Especially the way that you: a quirkless kid, tried to help his friend when we heroes couldn't. It was incredible, so brave and so attractive~" said the giantess hero keeping her tone "I wanted to talk to you, encourage you but the other heroes and the public didn't like you that much and I couldn't risk my popularity on my first day. But I was sure of one thing: even though I couldn't have you because you are a teenager and I'm an adult, I HAD to have you, I needed you to be MINE and MINE only." her gaze went from lustfull and seductive to completly crazy "I investigated you, I got to know EVEYTHING about you; your name, family, your lack of quirk, and even the training with All Might. And I finally knew what to do, I would keep you to myself, and I would do it in a way that nobody would EVER found out where were you. So I asked for the machine as a weapon to interrogate villains more easily, and once you were alone I shrunk you and kidnapped you. And now you are MINE and I'll never let you leave this place without me."

"I-I-I..." Izuku didn't know what to say, he knew he shoul have been more scared, but he was actualy turned by this, he had a giantess and yandere fetish, and now both of fantasies became real "D-Do you really love that much?"

"More that anything in this world" said Yu, she seemed to have calmed down, she was now looking at him with pure lust in her eyes, she couldn't hold back anymore"let me you my love" she starts to undress.
13111.title: Mt. Lady

choices: Mt. Lady moves Izuku to her breasts
131111.content:
Yu completely undressed and licks her lip, strutting over to the tiny boy and shoving him between her large cheeks. “Oh my precious, you don’t know how lucky you are to get to touch my glorious butt.” She says, clenching her rear ended and gently slapping it a couple of times.

Izuku was actually enjoying this, Yu’s cheeks were incredibly soft and doughy and the shaking felt incredibly pleasant. The quirkless boy deciding to rub her cheeks in return. This caused the blonde woman to squeak and moan. “Oh my, didn’t take you long to understand your place. My darling Izuku, keep rubbing and show your love for me!” She moans with her tongue out, shaking her rear end some more. Yu didn’t care if the police would go looking for Izuku, she knew how to hide rp him from the world.

Yu was thinking whether to move Izuku to a different part of her body or have some more good ol fun with her butt.
131111.title: Let's see what happens!

info.brief_description: Thought it'd be fun to make a My Hero Academia giantess RP.
info.description:
Been watching a lot of My Hero Academia recently and thought it'd be fun to make a giantess RP.

Disclaimer: I will be allowing giants in this one, but sexual interactions should be kept to giantesses!

Other things allowed include:
Vore,
Digestion (You must be reborn afterwards)
Unbirth,
Futa,
Lactation,
Butt,
Breasts,
Feet,
+18

Not allowed:
Death,
Scat,
Farts,

No one sentence responses unless used to give more options and please use grammar. Also, if you have a part you want to continue on and not have someone else continue, put a plus next to that option.

Any questions? Message me!
